PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-12092022-11-10,  ,  ,  GAC, 
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to add twenty-three (23) individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0238 Publication Date: 2022-11-23
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to add twenty-three (23) individuals to Schedule 1 of the Regulations, prohibiting them from transacting business with individuals and businesses in Canada, and freezing their assets unless otherwise authorized by the Minister of the Foreign Affairs.
